thread.title: Nokia 8 Android Phone price revealed; check out the other new features
thread.title_full: Nokia 8 Android Phone price revealed; check out the other new features

author: FE Online
title: Nokia 8 Android Phone price revealed; check out the other new features
text:
Nokia 8 Android Phone price revealed; check out the other new features Nokia 8 Android Phone price revealed; check out the other new features The new Nokia 8 Android phone was found on Chinese e-commerce website JD.com for pre-registrations. By: FE Online | Published: February 21, 2017 1:15 PM The Nokia 8 Android phone is speculated to be launched at the MWC event in 2017. 
The new Nokia 8 Android phone was found on Chinese e-commerce website JD.com for pre-registrations. The new smartphone looks like the flagship device for Nokia, which is relaunching itself at the MWC on February 2017, going by its price. The Nokia 8 Android phone is speculated to be launched at the same MWC event in 2017. According to the JD.com, Nokia 8 has been listed with a price tag of CNY 3,188, which roughly translates to Rs 31,000 in Indian currency. Although, if the smartphone is launched in India at any price close to this, it would likely give other flagship phones in the same range a run for their money. It, however, has to be noted that Nokia has not officially confirmed the listing of the flagship smartphone. Although, such listings do mean that the Nokia 8 could officially be announced at the MWC a week later on Sunday. 
Specifications: 
Nokia 8 is rumoured to be operated by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 835 SoC. The picture of the phone in the listing on Chinese e-commerce websites show that the device has an ultra-slim-bezel display and has a 5.7-inch Super AMOLED display. The screen resolution is expected to be 1440 x 2560 pixels. On the camera front, the handset is expected to be featuring a 24-megapixel rear camera with Optical Image Stabilisation. IT would also have a front camera of 12 megapixels. The smartphone is also rumoured to be launched with 2 storage versions; 64 GB and 128 GB; with varying prices for both. An expandable storage support for a microSD card of up to 256GB is also said to be included in the device. The Nokia 8 Android is to run on the new Android 7.0 Nougat 
Also watch: 
Date of Launch: 
HMD’s keynote at the Mobile World Congress starts on Sunday, February 26, 2017, at 4:30 pm local time(9 pm IST). Nokia 8 Android is the most expected phone launch for the event. Meanwhile, other smartphones such as the Nokia P1, Nokia’s budget phones Nokia 3 & 5 are also to be launched. Nokia also aims at bringing back nostalgia with the return of Nokia 3310 feature phone. The event might also speak about the time at which the already launched Nokia 6 would be made globally available. Please Wait while comments are loading...
